channel.title: blogging on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Neil Grogan

item.title: Test blog with Org-mode
item.description: Why blog with Org mode? Org is a mode for keeping notes, maintaining TODO lists, and project planning with a fast and effective plain-text system. Like most things in the Emacs world, this description of Org mode belies the true depth of what it can do. Mostly I use Org mode only superficially as a way to track notes and projects, using it as a tree of tasks and the status of each.
